about_the_game:
Step into Timeland—a cursed world where time stands frozen and where ancient magic courses through the lands. In Another Realm, you take on the role of Jimmy, a young man searching for his missing brother in a world filled with strange, yet familiar creatures. Along the way, you’ll unlock powerful memories that the characters struggle with, uncover hidden truths and solve puzzles in a time-frozen reality.

In your quest, you’ll encounter powerful magic, ancient totems that unlock fragments of the past. As you journey deeper into Timeland, you’ll discover that your ability to touch these magical totems—once the power of mages alone—holds the key to unlocking the realm’s deepest mysteries and your fate.

Will you find your way back home, or will you discover a new purpose in this mysterious world?

Multiple Game Modes:

Adventure Mode:

For those who crave a balanced RPG experience, Adventure Mode offers engaging turn-based battles, strategic progression, and intricate puzzle-solving.

Equip your party with progressively more powerful weapons and armor as you level up and unlock unique skills.

With around 12 hours of gameplay, you’ll face progressively tougher challenges that test both your combat abilities and puzzle-solving skills.

Story Mode:

If combat isn’t your focus and you prefer to dive deeper into the narrative, Story Mode offers a streamlined experience where all random and forced battles are removed.

Journey through Timeland with the focus on storytelling and character development, free from combat distractions.

This mode is perfect for players who want to immerse themselves in the world, characters, and narrative without the need for strategic combat encounters.

Demo Now Available:

Try the game and unlock the beginning of the story. Your saves can be transferred to the main game should you wish to continue onwards!

content_descriptors.notes: The game explores themes related to abuse, bullying, death, and other mental health challenges. These issues are portrayed through memories and story segments that may be unsettling for some players.

short_description: You awaken at the shores of a land seemingly far from home, your boat wrecked, not really knowing what actually happened. Your only option is to find civilization and hope to find a way home. Not all is as it seems, as Jimmy will soon find out!
